name: Verify Player Orientation After Ladder Transition to Ship
description: Validates that the player orientation after climbing the ladder positions them appropriately in the ship room.
testObjective: Ensure player is facing the correct direction after ship transition for optimal UX.
author: Dominic Brooks

steps.action: Climb the ladder after obtaining the suit
steps.expected: Player transitions from intro area to ship room

steps.action: Observe the player's orientation upon arrival in ship
steps.expected: Player is facing the door (or appropriate direction for next interaction)

steps.action: Note the location of the interaction button
steps.expected: Interaction button should be visible or easily accessible (not behind player)

postconditions: Player orientation allows for intuitive progression
